# Tender for External Audits

## Solicitation Information

* **Tender Number**: cb-218-32044217
* ** Solicitation Number**: 20240410
* **Publication Date**: July 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 23, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: July 23, 2024

## Tender Overview

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking the services of a team to provide external audits for the fiscal years ending March 31, 2025 to March 31, 2028, with option years for fiscal years ending March 31, 2029 and March 31, 2030. The scope of work includes:

* Annual audits of OSFI's financial statements
* Triennial audit of administrative costs charged to Employment and Social Development Canada by OSFI for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2027
* Optional services for other external audit-related services, as and when required, upon approval between the Project Authority and Contractor

## Tender Requirements

* The selected team must have expertise in external audit services and be familiar with the Canadian audit regulations and standards.
* The team must have the capability to perform audits in a timely and efficient manner, with a focus on quality and professionalism.

## Trade Agreements and Regions

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

The contract will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).
